name: Puzzle #1

comments:
Can you fix this Java code so that your avatar
reaches the flag?
You can run this entire Java program, just click the green play button on the far left (Try it now!).
The initial code is incorrect: Move the statements up and down to fix the sequence of statements.

You can change the ordering of the two lines of code: 
Select a line of code, 
Click the small up and down arrows that appear over the line numbers to swap their order.
Re-run your code to see if it's now correct. Hint: The avatar always starts from the same place.

Change the order of the go() and turnRight() statements: Click on 
 a line of code. Move it up and down, then re-run your program!

dyk: Most of the time we need to write a ; after each statement
When the computer executes your program, it executes one statement at a time before executing the next one.
Computer programs are a like movie scripts and cooking recipes - the correct sequence matters!
